items.todoItem: Listen carefully to your father’s instruction and seek to learn understanding.
Know that wisdom is the most important thing.
Wisdom is the principle thing therefore diligently seek to obtain it.
Do everything you can to get understanding.
Know that when you embrace and exalt wisdom you will gain promotion and honour.
Take firm hold of instruction and don’t let go because your life depends on it.
Don’t speak disobediently or deliberately speak improperly.
Don’t speak obstinately to the contrary of what is right or proper.
